mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customer ORDER BY cusCode desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (cusCode, cusName, cusCategory, cusType, cusNumber, cusRep, cusTel, cusHome, cusAddress, cusResp, cusPhone, cusEmail, cusFax, cusMemo, cusStatus, cusDate) VALUES(CONCAT('CUS', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d%H%i%s')), #{cusName},#{cusCategory},#{cusType},#{cusNumber},#{cusRep}, #{cusTel}, #{cusHome}, #{cusAddress}, #{cusResp}, #{cusPhone}, #{cusEmail}, #{cusFax}, #{cusMemo}, #{cusStatus}, #{cusDate})
